welcome_message_body: Welcome to the charming city of Kingston upon Hull! Known for its rich maritime history and vibrant arts scene, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that this beautiful city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humaita Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Humaita Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Humberside International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.
